Suppose that you are presented with a dataset 


```{python}
#| echo: false

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np 

df = pd.DataFrame({
  "X": np.random.randn(10),
  "Y": np.random.randn(10)
})

nan_x = np.random.choice(np.arange(10), size = 3, replace = False)

nan_y = np.random.choice(np.arange(10), size = 2, replace = False)

for i in nan_x:
  df.iloc[i].X = np.nan

for i in nan_y:
  df.iloc[i].Y = np.nan

df
```
